solution_line_template: There are {economy_class_capacity} / {economy_class_occupancy_divisor} = <<{economy_class_capacity}/{economy_class_occupancy_divisor}={economy_class_people}>>{economy_class_people} people in economy class.

There are {economy_class_people} people in business first and business class, so there are {economy_class_people} - {first_class_people} = <<{economy_class_people}-{first_class_people}={business_class_people}>>{business_class_people} in business class.

Thus, there are {business_class_capacity} - {business_class_people} = <<{business_class_capacity}-{business_class_people}={unoccupied_business_seats}>>{unoccupied_business_seats} unoccupied seats in business class.
